trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TypeValidationEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TypeValidationEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class is an optional event that is raised only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A> property is explicitly set to a type other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted> evento o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> classe é um evento opcional que é gerado apenas se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A> propriedade é definida explicitamente como um tipo diferente de `null`.

trans-unit.source: Typically, a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted> event is implemented to perform mask-specific and type-specific validation processing.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um manipulador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted> evento é implementado para executar o processamento de validação específicos de máscara e um tipo específico.

trans-unit.source: In contrast, general validation is typically performed in the standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> base class.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, a validação geral normalmente é executada no padrão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> evento definido no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> classe base.
